summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PitchFire SaaS application. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend UI tests passed including auth flows, dashboard, create proposal, settings, and pricing pages.
critical_code_review_comments: N8N_WEBHOOK_URL is MOCKED - external webhook for proposal generation will timeout (expected behavior per requirements)
Payment integration (Skydo) is placeholder - PAYMENT_LINKS in PricingPage.js contain PLACEHOLDER values
Consider adding data-testid to Dashboard page container for easier testing
seed_data_creation: Multiple test users created during signup tests with prefix test_signup_* and test_upgrade_*
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Backend uses MongoDB (not Supabase). Auth is JWT-based. N8N webhook is external and expected to timeout. Payment integration is placeholder.

landing_page.details: Hero section, features, pricing preview, nav buttons all working

auth_modal.details: Login and signup modes work correctly, initialMode prop syncs properly

signup_flow.details: New users created with plan=free, proposals_limit=5

login_flow.details: Existing user authentication works, redirects properly

dashboard.details: Shows user stats (0/5 usage), empty proposals state, upgrade banner

create_proposal.details: All 3 input methods (job_description, single_lead, csv) present, platform selection works

settings.details: All 4 tabs (Business Info, Your Pricing, Contact Info, GitHub) present, save via API works

pricing_page.details: All 4 tiers displayed with correct pricing, monthly/annual toggle works

protected_routes.details: Unauthenticated users redirected to home from /dashboard and /settings

mocked_apis.N8N_WEBHOOK_URL: External webhook for proposal processing - expected to timeout
